text:
Cool, you were right. I must have missed it. I have just changed `-` to `_` and everything works just fine.

Thanks a lot!

[Resolved]Hi all,

I am getting an error when hitting the files endpoint for a file ID returned from a file property of my deal. Does anyone know how to get past this?

• I have a file property for my deals for POs to be uploaded manually in the UI by our sales team
• When I use the API to return the deal, I get what looks like a file id:
• `"customer_po_file": "1710803354XX",`
•  However, I can't find this file in the Libraries -> Files manually in the UI, and when I try the endpoint : `"<https://api.hubapi.com/files/v3/files/1710803354XX>"`  I get a 404 error
• I am hoping to get a URL we can use to upload the file programmatically to our fulfillment/accounting software
Does anyone know how to access file property files via the API? Thank you!
Sorry - sorted. It was a scopes issue. You need the scope "files.ui_hidden.read" to see these. Wished the error suggested this!
There's no error. Response is okay, but it doesn't associate to a contact even though I passed the association parameters.
this looks solid to me, without seeing the output from the api server
Glad you got it sorted out!!
